name: Adam n Eve
description:
Adam & Eve is a beautiful but simple game. On each grid there is an emoji that appears six times.

Touch all six emojis to earn points, and then the grid refreshes with a different emoji of interest, and it keeps going on and on until you mind eventually fries and you can't see anything lol.

Depending on how fast you get, you can set the timer to 10, 8 or 6 seconds. Trust me, 6 seconds for six emojis is hard!!!

You can choose between food emojis and animal emojis, and you can actually switch types mid game. I like the food one better; it doesn't mess with my mind so much :)

Come back and rate us if you find it awesome.


Shout out to the guys at Bensound for their awesome in game music and flaticon and emojione for their icons
